name: La Tale - Evolved
description: Enter the magical world of La Tale, the beautiful 2D side-scrolling fantasy MMORPG. Choose from 10 distinct Classes, over 50 potential Job Specialties, and hundreds of unique weapons, pets and gear to create your own Hero of legend. Tell your tale today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce4 MX, ATI RADEON 9000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Not compatible with Voodoo graphics cards
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 530 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7 Series, ATI RADEON HD DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Not compatible with Voodoo graphics cards
